title: The President of Ukraine and the Prime Minister of Canada Discussed the Development of Steps Needed to End the War
snippet: Home :: WMD :: Library :: News :: Ukraine :: 2025 :: December :: ... President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy had a phone call with Prime Minister of Canada Mark Carney. The leaders discussed the development of steps necessary to end the war and diplomatic work with partners.
